text: Khumbula ngenkathi udadewenu ehamba futhi ethi, “ngakube nginganikhombisa lowo ozomgada yini na?” “Ngakho-ke sakubuyisela kunyoko ukuze apholise amehlo akhe futhi ungaphatheki kabi, ngakho-ke ubulale umuntu sabe sesiyakusindisa enhluphekweni futhi sakulinga ngezilingo wase uhlala iminyaka eminingi nabantu baseMidiyane wabe sewuyeza njengoba kuyisikhathi esinqunyiwe Oh Mose
